value.title: Show last 6 months based on user single slicer selection
value.excerpt: How to use calculation groups to show the behavior of any measure in the last 6 months (or any other number of months), starting from a single date selection with a slicer. Article and download: https://sql.bi/704248?aff=yt  How to learn DAX: https://www.sqlbi.com/guides/dax/?aff=yt The definitive

value.title: DAX 101 by Curbal
value.excerpt: New to DAX? Start here. This playlist contains all the introductory videos for learning DAX.

topItems.title: #1 DAX Fridays! 101: The basics of the DAX Language

topItems.title: #2 DAX Fridays! 101: Introduction to filter and row context
